scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: npx terser assets/js/main.js -o assets/js/main.min.js -c -m && npx terser assets/js/utils.js -o assets/js/utils.min.js -c -m
scripts.check:all: npm run check:games-index && npm run check:run-categories && npm run check:codeowners
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:games-index && npm run generate:run-categories && npm run generate:codeowners
scripts.sync:git: git fetch origin && git reset --hard origin/main
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:schema && npm run validate:runs
